attributes.action: Lets get Tougher on Knife Crime
attributes.additional_details:
Too many people are dying as a result of knife / gang crimes, the government need to get tougher on those convicted and also people caught carrying knives or weapons! Young kids nowadays look at Prison as a positive status believing they will gain more respect if they have 'served time'.

The Government need to get tougher on knife / gang crimes and do away with the early release, NO MORE CUSHY JAIL CELLS, LET'S TREAT CRIMINALS AS CRIMINALS!!
